title: From Waltz To '90s Icon: The Unforgettable Life Of The Nokia Ringtone
teaser: With the announcement that Nokia will move away from the smartphone market, it's worth taking a moment to remember a sound once ubiquitous, which we might never hear again: the Nokia ringtone.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
